title: House Hunters
description:
Do you ever imagine leaving your life behind, moving to an exotic locale, and starting a new life? Nikki and Mr. Malone go virtual house-hunting in four amazing locations around the world, and then choose their top pick.

Follow Mr. Malone on Twitter and Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Learn more about your dog with Embark. Use promo code SMILE for $50 off!

Make a great thing even better. Go to OMGyes.com/SMILE for a special discount.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
